Academic Computing and Communications Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Academic Computing and Communications Center      Academic Computing and Communications Center   Main Menu    Services           Communication and Collaboration    Computing Services    Infrastructure    Professional Services    Research    Security    Teaching and Learning         Support           Academic Continuity    Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio    ARC Helpdesk    C-Stop BSB    C-Stop LHS    Daley Library Helpdesk    LTS Support Office         Service Status           Service Notices         News           All News         Forms    About           Identity    Leadership    Policies    Reports    Jobs          Eyebrow menu    WebStore    Online Training    Answers    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Academic Computing and Communications Center    Support    Academic Continuity        Academic Continuity      Technology Basics for Academic Continuity        Instructor Focused  Due to prolonged campus and/or building closures, ACCC has the resources and support that you need to teach remotely.          Student Focused  Due to prolonged campus and/or building closures, ACCC has the resources and support that you need to learn remotely.          Staff Focused  ACCC offers the resources and support you need in the event that you are authorized to perform your work remotely.          ACCC Services and Operational Status  Most ACCC services will remain fully available and supported at this time, with some notable exceptions.
